headline: Hudson Pacific Appoints T. Ritson Ferguson to Board of Directors
summary: LOS ANGELES, September 15, 2025--Hudson Pacific Properties, Inc. (NYSE: HPP), a unique provider of end-to-end real estate solutions for tech and media tenants, today announced the election of T. Ritson Ferguson to the company’s Board of Directors, and the retirement of Director Mark D. Linehan, both effective September 11, 2025.

headline: Tracking Ron Baron's BAMCO Portfolio - Q2 2025 Update
summary: Ron Baron's BAMCO Inc. 13F portfolio grew to $36.89B in Q2 2025. Check out the top holdings and significant stake increases of the portfolio here.
